K10D0354_H0362:328b-18: tshe 'di la mar me btsugs nas mchod pa byed
K10D0354_H0362:328b-19: pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de
K10D0354_H0362:328b-20: ni / nyi zla'i lhar skye bar 'gyur bas 'od
K10D0354_H0362:328b-21: zer gyis bdag nyid gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro
K10D0354_H0362:328b-22: ni / // tshe 'di la sbyin pa gtong ba la dga' ba dang /
K10D0354_H0362:328b-23: byams pa'i sems kyis srog chags gso bar dga' ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0354_H0362:328b-24: skye ba thams cad du phyug por 'gyur bas gos zas dag rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:328b-25: tshe 'di la skye bo mang po rnams la bza' ba dang /
K10D0354_H0362:328b-26: btung ba sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0354_H0362:329a-0: skye ba thams cad du lha'i zas rang 'byung @329a *//
K10D0354_H0362:329a-3: stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10D0354_H0362:329a-4: dbang po rno zhing spobs pa dang ldan pa dang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329a-5: gang gis dud 'gro'i gnas su song ba rnams la sbyin pa yongs su btang na /
K10D0354_H0362:329a-6: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu brgya 'gyur snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329a-7: 'dod chen po dag la sbyin pa yongs su btang
K10D0354_H0362:329a-8: na rnam par smin pa stong 'gyur snyed 'thob par
K10D0354_H0362:329a-9: 'gyur ro // tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong
K10D0354_H0362:329a-10: la sbyin pa yongs su btang na rnam par smin
K10D0354_H0362:329a-12: gang gis theg pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0354_H0362:329a-13: gsang ba'i snying po 'khor mang po la yang dag
K10D0354_H0362:329a-14: par bsgrags nas / sems kyi mig 'byed pa'i chos
K10D0354_H0362:329a-15: smra ba gang dag la sbyin pa yongs su btang
K10D0354_H0362:329a-16: na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa
K10D0354_H0362:329a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa yongs su btang na /
K10D0354_H0362:329a-20: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa med pa snyed la longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329a-22: gang zag rnam pa gsum la sbyin pa yongs su
K10D0354_H0362:329a-23: btang na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su
K10D0354_H0362:329a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K10D0354_H0362:329a-28: zas za gcig tsam yongs su btang bas kyang rnam
K10D0354_H0362:329b-0: @329b par smin pa'i 'bras bu tshad med pa snyed
K10D0354_H0362:329b-2: rtag par yongs su btang bas yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-3: tshe 'di la dge 'dun mang po'i sku bsil ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-4: skye ba thams cad du byang bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa dang /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-5: rang bzhin gyis gos zas dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-6: skye bo mang po la kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329b-7: tshe 'di la bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-8: mdo sde'i chos klog cing kha ton du 'don par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-9: skye ba'i gnas thams cad du sgra dbyangs snyan cing thos pa rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329b-10: tshe 'di la tshul khrims bsrung bar mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-11: skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin sdug cing /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-12: mi'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329b-13: tshe 'di la lam kar khron pa brkos nas skyed
K10D0354_H0362:329b-14: shing btsugs nas grib ma mang po kun la bsgribs
K10D0354_H0362:329b-15: par mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni
K10D0354_H0362:329b-16: / skye ba thams cad du mi'i rgyal po byed cing ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /
K10D0354_H0362:329b-17: btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:329b-18: tshe 'di la mdo sde bris te gzhan dag la
K10D0354_H0362:329b-19: byin nas klog tu bcug pa la mngon par dga'
K10D0354_H0362:329b-20: ba gang yin pa de ni; skye ba thams cad
K10D0354_H0362:329b-21: du bdag gi spobs pa mang po dang ldan pa
K10D0354_H0362:329b-22: dang / chos bslabs pa la lan gcig thos pa tsam gyis go bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-1: dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis rlob cing /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-3: rtag par mi'i nang du mchog dam pa gtso bo byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:330a-5: gru gzings bcas nas skye bo mang po sgrol bar mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de ni /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-6: skye ba thams cad du rin po che sna bdun phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-7: skye bo mang po kun gyis bkur zhing bsngags pa brjod nas mngon par dga' ba dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-8: phan tshun 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i tshe mang po kun gyis bsnyen bkur dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-12: ngas ji skad du mdo sde de dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-14: 'bras bu bstan nas sems can mang po rnams klog pa dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-16: mngon par bsgrub par bskul nas sdug bsngal gyis bgegs
K10D0354_H0362:330a-17: las yongs su bzlas pa de bzhin du 'dir yang
K10D0354_H0362:330a-18: de ltar bstan pa yin pas /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-19: gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
K10D0354_H0362:330a-20: thos nas; skur pa 'debs par byed pa de ni
K10D0354_H0362:330a-21: / tshe 'di nyid la lce'i dbang po ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0354_H0362:330a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0354_H0362:330a-24: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-25: ci ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi /
K10D0354_H0362:330a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-0: chos kyi rnam grangs @330b 'di ni legs nyes kyi rgyu dang /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-1: 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par sgrub par
K10D0354_H0362:330b-3: smon lam btab pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig
K10D0354_H0362:330b-4: / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-6: mi stong phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang
K10D0354_H0362:330b-7: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par
K10D0354_H0362:330b-8: gyur to // bud med brgya stong du ma tshe
K10D0354_H0362:330b-9: 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po med par
K10D0354_H0362:330b-10: gyur to // gyur nas / skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur to //
K10D0354_H0362:330b-11: sdig pa spyod pa'i skye dgu stong nyis brgya ni /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-13: bdag gi tshe rabs dran par gyur to //
K10D0354_H0362:330b-14: dge ba spyod pa'i skye bo tshad med pa dag ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob nas /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-15: rtag par bde ba myong bar gyur to //
K10D0354_H0362:330b-16: tshe 'pho bar 'gyur ba tshad med pa snyed ni
K10D0354_H0362:330b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skyes nas
K10D0354_H0362:330b-18: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i grogs su gyur to //
K10D0354_H0362:330b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-20: 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rang gi gnas su dong ste /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-21: bsod nams mngon par 'du byed cing /
K10D0354_H0362:330b-22: rab tu dga' bar dga' bzhin du spyod par gyur to //
K10D0354_H0362:330b-23: 'phags pa legs nyes kyi rgyu dang; 'bras bu bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0354_H0362:330b-24: zhus chen gyi lo tstsha ba bande chos grub kyis rgya gar dang /
